segments.text: Good evening . How many people of your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three . Two adults and one kid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . How much do you charge for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thirty for each adult , twenty each kid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Where can I get the food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please go to the tables over there for cold dishes and vegetables . The hot dishes are on the other side .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I need to pay extra charges for drinks like cola and juice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not for soft drinks . But we charge ten yuan for each alcohol order .
segments.speaker: S1
